caption: Men from the Maasai tribe perform a traditional jumping ritual as they observe a rite of passage to mark the transition to cultural junior elder within the Masai-Mara national reserve.

result.explanation: The image clearly shows Maasai men in traditional clothing performing a jumping ritual.  The location appears consistent with the Masai Mara National Reserve.  All entities are visually present and accurately represented.
